TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LabelOutsidePlotAreaStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the degree to which a label can be drawn outside a plotting area.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The LabelOutsidePlotAreaStyle enumeration represents the degree to which a label is allowed to leave a plotting area. It is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.AllowOutsidePlotArea%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle> object.
If you specify the Partial value, no more than 50% of the label can be drawn outside the plotting area.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelOutsidePlotAreaStyle No = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Labels cannot de drawn outside the plotting area.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelOutsidePlotAreaStyle Partial = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Labels can be drawn partially outside the plotting area.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelOutsidePlotAreaStyle Yes = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Labels can be drawn outside the plotting area.
